title: Do you think butterflies know how pretty they are? - Quora

response.answer_text: Butterflies are more interested in their own survival than they are how visually appealing they might be. Beauty is a human construct that most animals have little time for. If you can't eat it and you can't make babies with it, it doesn't really matter.
Butterflies are attracted to butterflies that look like themselves in order to mate. So one could say they prefer the way they look to other species.
